channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- AMD Ryzen™ Threadripper™ PRO Processors 5900 WX-Series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- AMD Ryzen™ Threadripper™ PRO Processors 5900 WX-Series

item.title: CVE-2022-23829|2024-06-18T19:01:57.007Z -- amd -- amd%20ryzen%E2%84%A2%20threadripper%E2%84%A2%20pro%20processors%205900%20wx-series
item.description: A potential weakness in AMD SPI protection features may allow a malicious attacker with Ring0 (kernel mode) access to bypass the native System Management Mode (SMM) ROM protections.
